timeline.bodyText:
to keep the same style with shutdown, can we rename the name of the method to startup?
here we may not need to throw InterruptedException  clearly?

+import org.springframework.shell.Bootstrap;

+  private static JLineShellComponent shell;
+
+  @BeforeClass
